attributes.action: not provide similar governmental guarantees to UK mutual societies as for banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Presbyterian Mutual Society is a society that excludes non Presbyterians from investing yet they want all members of society to compensate them.  This should not happen.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
